sections.heading: Library Construction; Federal Funds; Report.
sections.text:
The state library is hereby authorized to accept, and use, federal funds for library construction under the provisions of Title II, P.L. 88-269, subject to the approval of the department of administration. A detailed report shall be submitted to the legislature not later than January 31 of each year.

History:1964, Act 234, Imd. Eff. May 27, 1964
